{{tt|discard_block_engine}} is a pseudo-random number engine adaptor that discards a certain amount of data produced by the base engine. From each block of size {{c|P}} generated by the base engine, the adaptor keeps only {{c|R}} numbers, discarding the rest.

===Template parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|Engine|the type of the wrapped engine.}}
{{par|P|the size of a block. Expected that {{mathjax-or|\(\small{P&gt;0}\)|P &gt; 0}}.}}
{{par|R|the number of used numbers per block. Expected that {{mathjax-or|\(\small{0&lt;R\le P}\)|0 &lt; R â‰¤ P}}.}}
{{par hreq}}
{{par req named|Engine|RandomNumberEngine}}
{{par end}}
